name: How to setup Rails api with React
description: There are many ways to use React as the front-end of your web application. With Rails, there are a couple of gems available that embed React in your Rails code, essentially creating a Rails application with React built-in. But what if you want to completely separate concerns, or in other words, not mix your React and Rails code? This can be done fairly easily with Rails 6 and will be the topic of interest today.

name: Why you should learn CSS
description: Love it or hate it CSS is here to stay, and understanding it can make all the difference in your life as a web developer. So here are some reasons why shouldnâ€™t skip learning CSS.
